title: クラクラ、メラメラ、負けられない

text_block_list.text: Some time after the 'Kikuka Sho' ended, news arrived that Mihono Bourbon would be taking a long-term break due to an injury.
With a dark expression, Mihono Bourbon said her return to racing was uncertain, and Rice Shower, having lost her support, was left at a loss.
As Matikanetannhauser worried about the two, she received a call from Nice Nature.
Nice Nature told Matikanetannhauser that she had been encouraged by her many times before and expressed her gratitude.
From this conversation, Matikanetannhauser recalled the words Director Akikawa had once told her: 'It was because of you that others could push forward.'
